name: Underground Mining
description:
This is a very early version of a mining simulator based on the mining minigame in Pokémon Diamond, Pearl and Platinum versions. Use the arrow keys to move over the tiles and use X to mine into the wall. Switch to a more precise tool with Z.

This cart is still being updated! Planned updates include:

  • More treasure
  • Sounds
  • Progressive mechanics
  • And any suggestion you have!

Thank you for playing!
